attributes.action: Stop Saudi Arabia's war on Yemen and stop UK arms sale to Saudi Arabia
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to take action to prevent human rights abuses which the UK upholds, promotes and encourages. The UK, including other nation-states, have continued to turn a blind eye on this issue and will eventually have severe consequences not just regionally in the middle east, but a global refugee crisis.
attributes.background: A years-long war devasts Yemen by the heavy militarised Saudi Arabia. Millions are dying and are homeless. The people need our help in providing shelter and war-free zones. The UK must stop supporting Yemen in terms of proving the state weapons.
